title: North Community Associates: Lilla Cabot Perry—Seeing the World through Her Paintbrush
hero_caption: Claude Monet. The Petite Creuse River, 1889. Potter Palmer Collection.
description:
Join Lynn Rymarz as she portrays Lilla Cabot Perry, an American artist who developed her own unique style of painting portraits. Perry was mentored by and became a good friend of Claude Monet, and her move to Japan highly influenced her work and earned her recognition.

Schedule of the Day

11:30 Registration and Check-In
12:00 Lunch
1:00 Lecture
